references.paper_title: Instructpix2pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper proposes a new instruction-guided image editing paradigm, which is highly relevant to PhotoDoodle's approach to text-guided image editing.

references.paper_title: Lora: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: PhotoDoodle utilizes the low-rank adaptation (LoRA) technique for efficient style customization, and this paper introduces the core concept of LoRA.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: PhotoDoodle is built upon diffusion models, and this paper introduces the key concept of latent diffusion models which are central to the PhotoDoodle method.

references.paper_title: Glide: Towards photorealistic image generation and editing with text-guided diffusion models
references.reason: PhotoDoodle leverages diffusion transformers for image editing, and this paper makes significant advancements in text-guided image generation and editing using diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Prompt-to-prompt image editing with cross attention control
references.reason: This paper introduces a prompt-to-prompt approach for image editing, which is a relevant technique to PhotoDoodle's strategy of manipulating images based on text prompts.
